home.subtitle: Manage your Werewolf games with ease!

features.managePlayersDesc: Easily add, edit, and organize players for your games.
features.assignRolesDesc: Randomly assign roles or customize them for each player.
features.gameFlowDesc: Guide the game through each phase with built-in timers and prompts.

roleDetail.confirmDelete: Are you sure you want to delete {name}?

playerDetail.confirmDelete: Are you sure you want to delete {name}?

werewolf.name: Werewolf
abilities: Transform at night
Vote to eliminate a villager each night

villager.name: Villager
abilities: Vote during the day to eliminate suspected werewolves
Discuss and deduce werewolves' identities

seer.name: Seer
seer.description: Can see the true identity of one player each night
abilities: Reveal the true identity of one player each night (defined by the moderator)
Share information to help villagers

town_guard.name: Town Guard
town_guard.description: Protects a player each night from being eliminated.
abilities: Choose one player to protect each night
Cannot protect the same player two nights in a row

hunter.name: Hunter
hunter.description: Can eliminate one player when they are eliminated by the werewolves
abilities: When eliminated, can choose one player to eliminate as well

witch.name: Witch
witch.description: Has a poison and a potion that can be used to save a player or eliminate a player
abilities: Use a healing potion to save a player (defined by the moderator)
Use a poison to eliminate a player (defined by the moderator)

priest.name: The Priest
priest.description: He can spray a player with holy water. If that player is a werewolf, he will be eliminated
abilities: Spray a player with holy water each night (defined by the moderator)
Eliminate a werewolf if sprayed

detective.name: The Detective
detective.description: Can investigate two players (next to each other) each night to see if they are on the same team
abilities: Investigate two players (next to each other) each night
Determine if the investigated players are on the same team

thief.name: The Thief
thief.description: Can switch his identity with another player once during the game
abilities: Switch identity with another player once per game
Assume the role and team of the switched player
If switched with a villager with special abilities, the theif will work what ever left of those abilities
If switched with a werewolf, the werewolf will be eliminated

judge.name: The Judge
judge.description: Can invoke the voting of the village during the game, the player who is voted out will not be eliminated
abilities: Invoke voting round (defined by the moderator)
The voted player is not eliminated in this special round

crow.name: The Crow
crow.description: He chooses a player, during the voting that player will hold two votes
abilities: Choose a player to have two votes during the day voting
Can change the chosen player each night

elder.name: The Elder
elder.description: If eliminated, the villagers' actions will be cancelled
abilities: Cancel villagers' actions if eliminated

patient.name: The Patient
patient.description: If eliminated by the werewolves, the werewolves will lose their night actions. If the villagers voted him out, the werewolves will kill twice
abilities: Cause werewolves to lose night actions if eliminated by them
Cause werewolves to kill twice if eliminated by villagers

scapegoat.name: Scapegoat
scapegoat.description: He can choose to be eliminated instead of another player whom has been voted out
abilities: Choose to be eliminated instead of another player whom has been voted out
Can use this ability once per game

bigBadWolf.name: The Big Bad Wolf
bigBadWolf.description: He is the werewolf leader, he can choose to eliminate one player each night, and can choose to change a werewolf with a villager (the werewolf will be eliminated)
abilities: Eliminate one player each night
Can swap a werewolf with a villager, eliminating the werewolf

wolfCub.name: The Wolf Cub
wolfCub.description: When eliminated by the villagers, the werewolves will kill one more player
abilities: Appear as a regular werewolf
When eliminated by villagers, werewolves kill an extra player

seerWerewolf.name: The Seer Werewolf
seerWerewolf.description: He can reveal the true identity of one player once per game
abilities: Act as a regular werewolf
Reveal the true identity of one player once per game

whiteWerewolf.name: The White Werewolf
whiteWerewolf.description: Lone wolf, he can kill a werewolf each two nights, he only wins if he is the only werewolf surviving
abilities: Kill a werewolf every two nights
Win condition: be the only surviving werewolf

drunk.name: The Drunk
drunk.description: Loner Role, when he is eliminated by the villagers, he alone will win the game
abilities: Win the game if eliminated by villagers
Appear as a regular villager to others

cupid.name: Cupid
cupid.description: In the first night he can choose two players to fall in love, if one of those players is eliminated the other player will be eliminated too, Cupid will only win when the two players are the only ones surviving
abilities: Choose two players to fall in love on the first night
Win if the two lovers are the only survivors

instructions.Night: Night phase: Special roles perform their actions. Werewolves choose a victim.
instructions.Day Discussion: Day Discussion: All players discuss the events of the night and try to identify the Werewolves.
instructions.Day Voting: Day Voting: All players vote on who to eliminate.
instructions.Execution: Execution: The player with the most votes is eliminated. Special roles may activate.
